SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.tools

Class Database<T>

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.tools.Database<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Entity for storage and accessing in this database
Direct Known Subclasses:
CourseDatabase, ExamDatabase, QuestionDatabase, StudentDatabase, SubmissionDatabase, TeacherDatabase
public class Database<T> extends Object
Class representing the database of entity. Used for accessing and retrieving entity form files

    • queryByField

      public List<T> queryByField(String fieldName, String fieldValue)
      Search for entities with specific field with value exactly same as the field value provided
      Parameters:
      fieldName - The field for searching
      fieldValue - The value of the field that exactly matches
      Returns:
      List of entity as the searching result

    • queryFuzzyByField

      public List<T> queryFuzzyByField(String fieldName, String fieldValue)
      Search for entities with specific field with value as string containing the field value provided
      Parameters:
      fieldName - The field for searching
      fieldValue - The value of the field that fuzzily matches
      Returns:
      List of entity as the searching result

    • queryByEntity

      public List<T> queryByEntity(T entity)
      Search for entities based on the entity provided, with field values exactly same as those declared in the entity
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity with declared field for searching
      Returns:
      List of entity as the searching result

    • setValue

      private void setValue(Object entity, String fieldName, Object fieldValue)
      Set the value of specific field of a specific entity to the value given.
      ps: Gson is used instead of given code to set the value for preventing error when setting enum, array, list or primitives.
      Parameters:
      entity - Entity to set the value
      fieldName - Name of field to set the value
      fieldValue - Value to be set

    • txtToEntity

      private T txtToEntity(String txt)
      Convert a json string in database file to its java object representation in entity type
      ps: Gson is used in here for conversion to prevent suspicious error in conversion
      Parameters:
      txt - Json string representation of the entity
      Returns:
      Java object representation of the entity

      Returns:
      Json string representation of the entity

    • validateNumberRange

      public static void validateNumberRange(int lower, int upper, int input, String fieldName, String unit)
      Validate the integer such that it is in range (lower, upper) given
      Parameters:
      lower - Lower limit of the integer
      upper - Upper limit of the integer
      input - Input integer
      fieldName - Name/ Representation of the integer
      unit - Unit used for the integer
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Integer out of range

    • validateNumberRange

      public static void validateNumberRange(int lower, int upper, String input, String fieldName, String unit)
      Convert the string to an integer and validate if it is in range (lower, upper) given
      Parameters:
      lower - Lower limit of the integer
      upper - Upper limit of the integer
      input - Input integer in string format
      fieldName - Name/ Representation of the integer
      unit - Unit used for the integer
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Integer out of range, or input string is not an integer

    • validateTextLength

      public static void validateTextLength(int length, String input, String fieldName)
      Validate if the string given has length in range (0, length)
      Parameters:
      length - Length limit of the input string
      input - Input string
      fieldName - Name/ Representation of the string
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Length out of range, or input is empty or null
